孏字的基本解释

孏
lǎn
古同“懒”。

孏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lǎn］
［《廣韻》落旱切，上旱，來。］
亦作“孄1”。亦作“孏1”。亦作“1”。
懒惰；懈怠。

孏字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　孏； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页274第31
【集韻】同嬾。【後漢·王丹傳】每歲農時，丹載酒肴，於田閒候勤者勞之，其墯孏者恥不致。丹皆兼功自厲。

考證：〔【後漢·王丹傳】每歲農時，丹載酒肴，田間勤苦者勞之，其惰孏者恥不致。〕　謹照原文田間上增於字。勤苦改候勤。惰改墯。恥改恥。致改致。下增丹皆兼功自厲六字以足文義。
孏字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
孏字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Young
lǎn
Gu Tong is "lazy".

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lǎn］
["Guangyun" cuts the drought, and the drought, come. ]
Also known as "孄1". Also known as "孏1". Also called "1".
Laziness; laziness.
Young
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　孏; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 274 31
【Jiyun】Same as lazy. [Hou Han·Wang Dan Biography] Every year in the farming period, the pill carries wine and food, and those who wait in the field do not work hard, and the others are not ashamed. Dan has done his best. Textual research: [[Houhan·Wang Dan Biography] Every year in the farming period, the Dan carries wine and food, and the hardworking people in the field work hard, and the lazy people are not ashamed. 〕 　 I would like to add to the word in the field according to the original text. Diligent change to wait for duty. Lazily change. Shame to shame. To change to. Xia Zeng Dan all contributes to the six characters of Li in order to fully understand the meaning.
